metadata.title: The Buddy Holly Story - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
description: 1978 Epic Records - Songs Include : 1. Rave On / 2. It's So Easy / 3. True Love Ways / 4. Clear Lake Medley : That'll Be The Day / Oh Boy / Peggy Sue / Maybe Baby / 5. I'm Gonna Love You Too / 6. Whole Lotta Shakin' Goin' On / 7. Well... All Right / 8. Listen To Me / 9. Maybe Baby / 10. Everyday / 11. Roller Rink Medley : Rock Around With Ollie Vee / That'll Be The Day
